item.title: Carys - Princesses Don't Cry
item.description:
Boys they’re handsome
and strong
But always the first
to tell me I’m wrong
Boys try to tame me
I know
They tell me I’m weird
and won’t let it go
No I’m fine I’m lying
on the floor again
Cracked
door
I always wanna
let you in
Even after all of this
xhit I’m resilient
‘Cause a princess
doesn’t cry(no)
A princess
doesn’t cry(no)
Over monsters
in the night
Don’t waste
our precious time
On boys
with pretty eyes
A princess
doesn’t cry(no)

doesn’t cry(no)

you feel it all inside
But wipe
your teary eyes

don’t cry

don’t cry

and poised

but God made me rough

the crown

tall

down

door

let them in once

come undone
